summary: If you want to be invisible permanently so you can explore enemy camps etc before making a move? Or you just wanna mess around? Then this mod is for you
descriptionHtml:
Ok so probably everyone knows about the invisibility spell in Skyrim which lasts about 30 seconds
Sometimes you just want more time or just feel like messing around a bit so thats why I created this little mod which extends the time period from 30 seconds to 535 days
You can find this spell lying next to your chest in breezehome in Whiterun
If you can\'t buy the house yet or simply don\'t have it just goto to the breezehome door press the tilde key (Thats the one to the left of 1 on your keyboard) then simply type in \'\'unlock\'\' (Without quotation marks) then you should be able to enter it
author: SolidSkyrim
